attributes.action: Ensure that third world growers benefit from fair trade prices for ALL tea, coffee, cocoa, bananas, oranges, honey etc consumed in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I greatly admire the work of the Fairtrade foundation, however the purchase of it's products is made only by those compassionate enough to pay the higher prices. How can it be acceptable that Asda sell a jar of coffee for 30p? If we are serious about tackling global poverty we need to tame the big supermarkets as well as companies like Nestlé and Del-Monte to ensure that our enjoyment of certain products does not hold back the prosperity of Africa and South America.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
